AlarmLogic.name: 判断开放状态-信号关闭

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_DC = 1
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 2
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 发车进路_2_信号机_1_HD_CSM_
DELAY_ALL: 180, 2, 1
IF: DW == 1
SET: OPEN_DC = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT_DC = 0

AlarmLogic.name: 判断开放状态-信号关闭

Steps.step: VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_DC = 1
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT = 2
VAR: GLOBAL KGL OPEN_SECT_DC = 3
SLT_KGL: DW = 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CBI_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CTC_, 接车进路_3_信号机_1_HD_CSM_

IF: DW == 1
SET: OPEN_DC = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT = 0
SET: OPEN_SECT_DC = 0
